attributes.action: Keep driving lessons, tests and theory going during this second lock down.
attributes.additional_details: There is already a back log and adding another month on to it won’t help anyone. There is little evidence to show that this is increasing the spread of Covid 19. In cars we wear mask when with instructors and tests we also do.
attributes.background: Keep driving lessons, tests and theory going during this second lock down.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
